info.title: PRA WellCompletion Volume
info.description:
You can read the WellCompletion Volume Document Header and measurement items.

WellCompletion Volume documents and WellCompletion measurement item will be created and deleted using this service. WellCompletion measurement item can be updated using this service.

x-sap-shortText: Production and Revenue WellCompletion Volumes is an inbound service which allows create, update, delete and read of WellCompletion Volume Document

values.text: [Revenue Accounting - Oil and Gas Production(5NM)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5NM " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET MeasurementItems HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
